pages.index: SunnySite - Your Gateway to Sun-Drenched Adventures SunnySite Tours About Partners Tariff Contact Discover Your Next Adventure Explore breathtaking destinations around the world with our expertly crafted travel packages. Explore Now Gallery Tours Coastal Escapade Tour Explore the stunning coastline and relax on sandy beaches. Perfect for sun-seekers and ocean lovers. $350 - $500 421✅ Mountain Majesty Expedition Embark on an exhilarating journey through rugged mountain landscapes and conquer breathtaking peaks. $600 - $800 731✅ Cultural Odyssey Experience Immerse yourself in rich cultural heritage and traditions, explore historic sites, and enjoy authentic local cuisine. $200 - $300 119✅ Wilderness Adventure Retreat Venture into the heart of the wilderness, camp under the stars, and experience thrilling outdoor activities. $400 - $600 601✅ About Our Mission At our company, our mission is to provide unforgettable travel experiences that enrich people's lives and create lifelong memories. We believe that traveling is more than just visiting places; it's about connecting with cultures, exploring new perspectives, and creating meaningful experiences. We strive to offer personalized and authentic travel experiences that cater to the diverse interests and preferences of our clients. Whether it's an adventurous expedition, a cultural immersion, or a relaxing getaway, we are committed to making your journey exceptional. Our Team Our team is comprised of passionate travel experts who are dedicated to making your journey remarkable. With years of experience in the travel industry, our team members are not only knowledgeable about destinations but also deeply committed to providing exceptional service. We believe that our success is built on the expertise, dedication, and enthusiasm of our team. From trip planning to on-the-ground support, our goal is to ensure that every aspect of your travel experience exceeds your expectations. Our Vision Our vision is to inspire and empower individuals to explore the world with curiosity and respect. We believe that travel, when done responsibly, has the power to broaden horizons, foster understanding, and promote positive change in the world. We are committed to promoting sustainable and responsible travel practices that minimize environmental impact, respect local cultures, and support communities. By encouraging mindful travel, we aim to contribute to a more sustainable and inclusive world. Partners Tariff Standard Dive into endless adventures with our Explorer's Choice tariff $899 per person Book Accommodation in standard rooms Daily breakfast and dinner Guided tours and activities Transportation to and from the airport 24/7 customer support Medium Satiate your wanderlust with our Wanderlust Wanderer tariff $1,499 per person Book Accommodation in premium rooms or boutique hotels Breakfast, lunch, and dinner included Guided tours, excursions, and cultural experiences Transportation throughout the trip 24/7 concierge service Specialized activities such as hiking, snorkeling, or cooking classes Premium Indulge in opulence and refinement with our Luxury Odyssey tariff $3,999 per person Book Stay in luxury suites or exclusive resorts Gourmet meals prepared by renowned chefs Private tours and exclusive experiences Chauffeured transportation in luxury vehicles Personalized service and attention to detail Access to VIP events and attractions Exclusive amenities such as spa treatments, yacht trips, or helicopter tours Tourism News New Eco-Friendly Resort Opens in Costa Rica May 8, 2024 Costa Rica welcomes a new eco-friendly resort, designed to minimize environmental impact and promote sustainability. The resort features innovative green technologies, including solar panels, rainwater harvesting systems, and organic waste composting. The new resort, located in the lush rainforests of Costa Rica, offers guests a unique experience of sustainable luxury. Visitors can enjoy eco-friendly accommodations, organic dining options, and a variety of nature-based activities. Italy Reopens Borders for Tourists June 15, 2024 Italy lifts travel restrictions and reopens its borders for international tourists. After months of closure due to the pandemic, Italy welcomes visitors from around the world, providing a boost to its tourism industry. Tourists can once again explore Italy's iconic landmarks, savor authentic Italian cuisine, and immerse themselves in the country's rich cultural heritage. The reopening of borders is a positive sign for the revival of global tourism. New Tourist Attraction Opens in Japan July 20, 2024 Japan unveils a new tourist attraction, a futuristic theme park inspired by traditional Japanese culture and technology. The park features immersive experiences, interactive exhibits, and thrilling rides. Visitors to the theme park can explore replicas of historic Japanese towns, participate in tea ceremonies, and try out the latest virtual reality attractions. The park aims to showcase Japan's blend of tradition and innovation. Reviews Adam Smith April 20, 2024 I had an amazing experience with this travel agency! They organized everything perfectly, from accommodations to excursions. I highly recommend them! Emily Johnson May 5, 2024 This was the best trip of my life! The guides were knowledgeable, the accommodations were comfortable, and the itinerary was well-planned. I can't wait to travel with them again! Sophia Brown June 10, 2024 I had such a fantastic time on my trip! Everything went smoothly, and the staff was friendly and helpful. Thank you for an unforgettable experience! Oliver Davis July 1, 2024 The trip exceeded my expectations! Every detail was taken care of, and the guides were excellent. I had an incredible time exploring new places and learning about different cultures. Ava Wilson August 15, 2024 I absolutely loved my vacation! The itinerary was well-planned, and the accommodations were fantastic. It was a stress-free experience, and I can't wait to book another trip with this agency! Benjamin Martinez September 5, 2024 I had an incredible time exploring new destinations! The tour guides were knowledgeable, and the activities were diverse. It was a memorable experience that I will cherish forever. Contact us I accept the Privacy Policy Send a message FAQ How can I book a tour? You can book a tour by filling out the booking form on our website or by contacting our customer service team directly. What payment methods do you accept? We accept payments via credit card, bank transfer, and PayPal. Can I cancel my booking? Yes, you can cancel your booking, but cancellation fees may apply depending on the timing of the cancellation. Please refer to our cancellation policy for more details. What should I pack for the tour? It depends on the destination and the activities included in your tour. We recommend checking our packing list guide on our website for specific recommendations. Do you provide airport transfers? Yes, we offer airport transfers as an optional add-on to your booking. Our representative will meet you at the airport and transfer you to your accommodation. How do I contact customer support? You can contact our customer support team via email, phone, or through the live chat feature on our website. Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you. Contact Us R. António de Miranda, 1761-Encruzilhada, Imperatriz-MA, 65903-130, Brazil +917856132489 SunnySite@gmail.com Terms Conditions Privacy Policy Tours About Partners Tariff Contact
pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy ul { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 10px; padding-left: 25px; li { list-style-type: disc; } } Back to Home Privacy Policy At SunnySite, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy applies to our website and all products and services offered by SunnySite. Information Security We have adopted appropriate practices for collecting, storing, and processing data, as well as security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information, and data stored on our website. Your personal information is stored on secure servers and protected by firewalls and advanced encryption to ensure maximum security. However, it is important to remember that no data transmission over the Internet or electronic storage method is 100% secure. Therefore, while we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. You are also responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your login information and password. We recommend choosing strong and unique passwords and not sharing your access credentials with anyone. If you have any concerns about the security of your personal information or suspect suspicious activity in your account, please contact us immediately so that we can take necessary measures to protect your privacy and security. Consent By using our website, you agree to our privacy policy and give consent for the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with the terms described in this Policy. We ask that you read it carefully before using our website. We understand the importance of privacy and are committed to ensuring that your personal information is treated securely, privately, and respectfully. We will not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties without your express consent, except as described in this privacy policy or as required by law. It is important to note that by providing your personal information, you are consenting to the transfer, processing, and storage of your data on servers located in different jurisdictions, including outside your country of residence, where data protection laws may be different from those of your country. If we make changes to this privacy policy, we will update the revision date at the bottom of this page. By continuing to use the site after such changes are published, you consent to the new practices described in this policy. Changes to this Privacy Policy At SunnySite, we may occasionally update our Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices and legal requirements. We encourage you to periodically review this Privacy Policy to stay informed about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By continuing to use our website and services after the changes to this Privacy Policy take effect, you agree to the updated terms. If you do not agree with any part of the updated policy, you may choose to discontinue using our website and services. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or the changes introduced therein, please contact us for clarification. Your privacy and trust are important to us, and we are committed to being transparent about our data practices. Your Rights At SunnySite, we respect your rights regarding your personal information and are committed to ensuring that you have control over your data. Therefore, you have the following rights: Right of Access: You have the right to request access to the personal information we hold about you. This includes information on how we collect, use, and disclose your data. Right to Update: You have the right to request updates or corrections to any inaccurate or incomplete personal information we hold about you. We strive to ensure that your information is accurate and up-to-date. Right to Erasure: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal information from our records. We will comply with your request, subject to certain legal and contractual obligations. Right to Object: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information for certain purposes, such as direct marketing or profiling. We will respect your preferences and cease processing your data for these purposes. Right to Restrict: You have the right to request restriction of the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances, such as when the accuracy of the data is contested or the processing is unlawful. Right to Data Portability: You have the right to receive a copy of your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format, and to transmit this data to another controller. If you wish to exercise any of these rights or have any questions about your rights regarding your personal information, please contact us using the contact information provided below. We will respond to your request promptly and in accordance with applicable data protection laws. Contact Us Feel free to contact us if you have any comments, questions, or concerns. Our Customer Support team is dedicated to providing assistance and support regarding our website, products, or services. R. António de Miranda, 1761-Encruzilhada, Imperatriz-MA, 65903-130, Brazil +917856132489 SunnySite@gmail.com We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours during our regular business hours. However, response times may vary depending on the volume of inquiries received.
pages.terms-conditions: Terms Conditions Back to Home Terms and Conditions 1. Introduction Welcome to the SunnySite Terms and Conditions page. By accessing or using the Website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions, our Privacy Policy, and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained on the site are protected by copyright and trademark law. Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using our website. Your access and use of the site is conditioned on your acceptance and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Website. By accessing or using the site, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of the Terms, you may not access the Website. SunnySite reserves the right to modify these Terms and conditions at any time. These modifications shall be effective immediately upon posting on the website. You are responsible for reviewing these Terms periodically to ensure you are aware of any changes. 2. Acceptable Use You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe upon the rights of others, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use or enjoyment of the website. You also agree not to engage in any unauthorized access to or use of the website's content, or any unlawful activities in connection with the website. 3. Intellectual Property The content of this site, including, without limitation, text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, video clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of SunnySite or its Content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. The compilation of all content on this The website is the exclusive property of SunnySite and is protected by international copyright laws. You may not modify, publish, transmit, participate in the transfer or sale, create derivative works, distribute, perform, display, or in any way exploit any content, in whole or in part, without the prior written consent of SunnySite. SunnySite trademarks, service marks, graphics, and logos used in connection with the website are trademarks or registered trademarks of SunnySite. Other trademarks, service marks, graphics, and logos used in connection with the website may be the trademarks of their respective owners. Your use of the website does not grant you any right or license to reproduce or use any SunnySite or third-party trademarks. SunnySite reserves all rights not expressly granted herein to the Website and its content. This Agreement does not transfer to you any SunnySite or third-party intellectual property and all rights, titles, and interests in and to such property shall remain (as between the parties) solely with SunnySite. You agree not to engage in the use, copying, or distribution of any content other than expressly permitted herein, including any use, copying, or distribution of third party user submissions obtained through the website for any commercial purposes. If you believe that your intellectual property rights have been violated by anything on our website, please contact us immediately so that we can investigate the situation and take appropriate action. 4. Links to Other Websites Our service may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by SunnySite. SunnySite has no control and assumes no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that SunnySite shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such websites or services. 5. Changes SunnySite reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to periodically review these terms for any changes. Changes to these Terms will be effective immediately upon posting on the Website. Your continued use of the website after any such changes to these Terms constitutes acceptance of those changes. SunnySite may also, in the future, offer new services and/or features through the website (including the release of new tools and resources). Such new features and/or services shall be subject to the Terms and conditions of these Terms. SunnySite reserves the right to modify or discontinue the Website (or any part thereof) temporarily or permanently with or without notice. SunnySite shall not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the website. If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of these Terms shall remain in effect. These Terms constitute the entire agreement between us regarding our website and supersede and replace any prior agreements we might have had between us regarding the website. 6. Contact Us We welcome any comments, questions, or concerns you may have. Our Customer Support team is dedicated to providing you with assistance and support regarding our website, products, or services. R. António de Miranda, 1761-Encruzilhada, Imperatriz-MA, 65903-130, Brazil +917856132489 SunnySite@gmail.com
pages.thank: Thanks! body { text-align: center; background-color: #f2f2f2; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; height: 90dvh; } .thanks { max-width: 600px; width: 100%; margin: 50px auto; background-color: #fff; padding: 40px 20px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 15px; h1 { color: #333; } p { color: #666; margin-bottom: 10px; } .btn { display: inline-block; padding: 10px 20px; background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 5px; transition: background-color 0.3s; } .btn:hover { background-color: #0056b3; } } Thank You! Your form has been successfully submitted. Back to Home
